Assess.definition: to determine the rate or amount of
Assess.origin: [each property owner was ed an additional five dollars]

1.definition: to determine the rate or amount of (as a tax)

2 a.definition: to impose (as a tax) according to an established rate

sub_terms.b: to subject to a tax, charge, or levy [each property owner wasan additional five dollars]

3.definition: to make an official valuation of (property) for the purposes of taxation
